revised_title: Advanced Techniques in Analyzing Micro- and Nanostructures in Semiconductors
tldr: The article discusses the use of transmission electron microscopy (TEM) in analyzing micro- and nanostructures in semiconductors. It reviews various applications of TEM in understanding layer growth, heteroepitaxial interfaces, and stress-relief processes in semiconductor materials. The techniques described provide valuable information for both fundamental research and advanced device technology.
